text: Eastern Orthodox cross July 13 - Eastern Orthodox Church calendar - July 15 All fixed commemorations below are celebrated on July 27 by Old Calendar. For July 14th, Orthodox Churches on the Old Calendar commemorate the Saints listed on July 1. ==Saints== * Apostle Aquila of the Seventy (1st century),Great Synaxaristes: Ὁ Ἅγιος Ἀκύλας ὁ Ἀπόστολος. 14 ΙΟΥΛΙΟΥ.
